operation.descriptionCdata:
b67c7169-c66e-457e-8582-4894bec639fc.9bf7ed43-df9f-4e4d-95c9-ee78378b582e.prompt=Select the Operation \: b67c7169-c66e-457e-8582-4894bec639fc.description=
Allows a user to select whether to delete a file or zip a file in a local machine or in  a remote machine.

Inputs\:
Action - The action to perform.

Note\:
This will not perform any operation. Simply a user defined Operation and used  to pass the control to next operation. 

Result \:
the given action.

Responses\:
LocalDelete 	- Files of specified extension from the given path will be deleted in the local machine
LocalZip 	- Files of specified extension from the given path will be zipped in to a given archive name in the local 		machine
RemoteDelete - Files of specified extension from the given path will be deleted in the Remote machine
RemoteZip	- Files of specified extension from the given path will be zipped in to a given archive name in the 		Remote machine
operation.name: Select Delete or Zip

scriptlet.name: Operation Select Delete or Zip (a96305de-b602-4751-9412-663e13f3a87d)
